skillTree.localised_description: The god of money, wealth and power protects it's patrons with a shield of coins.
If the Staatholder's Fog Walkers would be nearly as effective as Lisette Leerer when it comes to remaining unseen, Marienburg would be in a much different place.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: In Suiddock she's known as the Guild's Razor, a tool she frequently uses on those with the guts to make a move on her.
Trafficking goods untaxed in and out of Suiddock is vital in the Guild's success.

effects.description: Accompanying caravan will start with additional +200 cargos

Reduce the charge in extortion events: -25%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: She sells potions and goods as a front one of the buzzling markets of Marienburg, skimming batches of poison as a side hustle.
The Leather business is much more profitable as one would imagine. It's easy to get your hands on, as you can harvest it from a lot more than just cattle.
Having served as the personal bodyguard for many a crime lord, Lisette knows how to keep her assets safe.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Finding the weakspots of equipment is just like cracking a safe, and Lisette has plenty of experience doing just that.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

items.colour_text: Someone once asked Casanova what he wanted from life. "I want more," was the reply, as he forced the questioner to sign over his business. He is interested only in money. His rule is harsh, and so long as everyone acknowledges that he is the boss then no one gets hurt. When people do get hurt, on the other hand, it's generally in a spectacular fashion.\\n\\n Adalbert deals with Lea-Jan Cobbius as an equal, and the two have healthy respect for each other's power. Between them, they keep the peace in Suiddock in a way the Watch can never match. \\n\\n

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +35%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: ''What makes the Thievies guild a disciplined organization instead of thieving rabble? Simple, Lisette Leerer''.
